Blog.post: On this cold... Chilly night my power went out and so did my internet! >:0 grrr i hate it when it duz that, oh well this much needed rain will make a great mudding trip tomorrow! yeehaw! regardless im finnally getting back into the swing of things this summer. Basically trickeling outta vid. gamez and getting back into the real world. but its hard finding stuff to do with my free time, with out wasting gas! seems like i just drive around all day long, and its getting costly! any ways spend your rainy night well folks and i found out what i can do in my free time, spend it with God!

Amberly you are the greatest you have done so much, and i have done so little. Im glad to know how much i've impacted your life and how you've grown to be the woman that you are; from childish acts to grown-up words of affection. you prove to me how ignorant i truly am, from the silly wrapping sign that you so kiddishly did to the little poems you write here and there with your artisitc abillity. Im truly honored that your respect me in this way. Eat your green beans and you'll grow strong and use ur charmin and you will feel great love! spend your times alone with God, not your worst memories . take the time to realize how truly fortunate you are! You most certainly would not be here if it'werent for him so love, honor, and trust in him and you will be saved more than i could ever save you. Amberly you truly are one of a kind i thank him and you for being in my life. Lets grow strong together and worship in him together and carry on great friends.
urlLink Hello! Thanks for all the art years mommie! and daddy thanks for the scanner! urlLink
urlLink Heyo This is my on my b-day!!! :P im the one on the right and in the corners! GOOO photoshop! lol urlLink

Today was technically my first day w/o school! no EXAMS! woot i got alot of things to do this summer Get fit, church, Karen Dillards, friends and many other fun fun activities! ill post more la8er gotta run! peace in the middle east!

haha thanks for the posts guys but yeah i still have yet to have the urge to play a vid game... but now im wasting gas by going out with friends lol BOOOOOOOO! darn poop me anger lol ill see you later for reals! summer school Clancy I HOPE U HAD FUN WITH FONTS AT PAT GREEN!!!!! too bad cuz i was gunna take you to warp tour with me :( hehe TTYL!

boo today my work place thing went bankrupt! it was a lil mom n pop shop but eh, the money rocked! 200 n 4 days lol but now im outta work! crap! let me know if ne of ur works are hiring cuz now im sad :*( bah im outtie to summa school peace
Hey! I baught my first ebay! woooooo hooooo lol i baught a guitar for .6 cents! but the shipping was 30 :( boooo i hate that! rawr! any ways ill be jamming soon (if i get it) lol See yah'll soon!

Hey! I just got back from the PHPC youth website commitee (i started this extravagant adventrue when i told steve about my idea lol ) ne ways its a fun process this website will be available for everyone! it will have everything on it! it will be mucho fun! fun! hehe with forums and stuff! anyways back to working on the flash into so ill ttyl
Hey guys sorry i havnt posted in a long time! regardless its been a hectic week getting ready for summa school and Karen Dillards! its like 12 pm and i got a job interview tom! >.
